page.title: 07Health in Salterton.
page.content: Doctor Taylor has been a doctor for thirteen years.We asked him about the care of peoples health in Budleigh Salteron.He said that there are four doctors and 2 dentists in the town and that the main problems with elderly people are arthritis;heart and lung diseases and cancer.Young people suffer mainly from infectious diseases ,asthma and appendicitis. The town has a Health Centre, where doctors have their surgeries, and a cottage hospital. The hospital has 24 beds and 2 single rooms with a staff of 14 nurses.About 400 people are admitted each year and it is very comfortable, although patients are expected to do some things for themselves. There are two nursing homes in the town;St Cecilias and Bay Court.
